mapper.select: select cart_customer_id, cart_book_name, cart_book_sell_price, cart_book_count, cart_book_discount, cart_book_allprice*cart_book_count*cart_book_discount/10 as cart_book_allprice from cart where cart_customer_id = #{CartCustomerId}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_customer_id, cart_book_name, cart_book_sell_price, cart_book_count, cart_book_discount, cart_book_allprice) values (#{CartCustomerId},#{CartBookName},#{CartBookSellPrice},#{CartBookCount},#{CartBookDiscount},#{CartBookAllprice})
mapper.delete: delete from cart where cart_customer_id = #{param1} and cart_book_name = #{param2}
